Background, Analysis and Comments by Author

Equipment
Longbow
Robes

Key buff elements of this character are his incredibly high dexterity and plentiful Arcane Archer levels. At level 40, with a mundane Longbow, using Rapid Shot at an enemy within 30 feet, he can unleash the following:
Attacks: +59 / +59 / +54 / +49 / +44
Damage: 1d8 + 21

Surprisingly, the Arcane Archer also has good defensive capabilities. His Armour Class when wearing nothing but a mundane robe is 26. He also has a +5 bonus to saving throws vs. spells due to the Spell Craft ranks, as well as bonuses from the feats Luck of Heroes and Iron Will.

With tactical grace, this character can choose the location and timing of his battles. Thanks to excellent stealth abilities, he has +59 to Hide and Move Silently.
